column5: Welcome, there is no board like this one....enjoy!
Welcome, it's a great place to be....  Maureen
Welcome to the board dude!
Now stop that,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,you got me all verklempted too.  Welcome aboard.Enjoy yer stay.
welcome aboard.
welcome aboard, thats what fishing is about, special times with loved ones, and memories to last a life time. Great to have you both on site

Welcome aboard, you can learn a lot from the posts here and I hope to see many more fishing posts from you both in the future.  My 8 year old son has been my fishing partner for a few years now so I know how your dad feels  It just doesn't get any better.
Hi guys, I am new to the board but my dad has been posting for a couple of years. Here is my first video that I have posted. Thanks for watching.

That's my boy. You make me so proud every time we go out fishing.................and out fish me!!   You seem to know more about fishing now that I did at twice your age. I can still remember back the big smile on your face when you caught your first bass and I look forward to many more years of fishing with you.  Dad.
welcome aboard we do love photos and videos so keep them coming
That says it all right there. Welcome to you both. Jim
Very good stuff...welcome aboard.
Welcome, I'm pretty new myself and have become lets say HOOKED!
Welcome to OFC fishman2202  Great first post and loved the video Looking forward to your future reports!! Leechman
That was touching, a father and son post.  Dang, now I'm getting a little verklempt.

Welcome to the site . There is a lot of info here to make your fishing experiances the best that they  can be . Keep up the good work . It's so nice to see son amd dad out together. those are days that just can"t be beat.. Tight lines my friends
welcome to the board!  nice perch!  Cheers!
Thanks Everyone for watching my video. I will probly be going ice fishing one last time on friday if my dad takes the day off. I will get some more videos and want you guys to see them.
welcome aboard  Have spent many a day on a lake with the kids ,many more to come.  can't beat it  TB
That's the kinda stuff we like to see around here  Welcome to the board fishman and enjoy all the time you have with your Dad !!
You and yer Dad will just love it here. Welcome.  So who does the fish cleaning?
Agreed. Very cool posts.  Welcome.
Welcome to OFC!    Awesome that you are your Dad are able to share your love of the sport and your time together......good stuff!!

Welcome to OFC! Just in case you need it, the Addiction Research Centre has a room set aside for all OFC'ers, just in case the board goes down again or your ISP has service delivery issues... there's safety in numbers ya know! HH

Thanks for all your kind words in welcoming my son to the board. He is truly a student of the sport and I know this board has a wealth of knowledge available to him. Thank-you all for sharing that with us.  I enjoyed fishing growing up, but he truly has a passion for the sport. I am also fortunate to know where he is on the week ends. Too many kids his age are looking to cause trouble, joining gangs etc. His only concern is which one of his buddies is coming fishing with us. I only wish more kids shared his passion.  ....and yes I am taking the day off on Friday to take him fishing.   What better excuse to take a day off work!!!!

lol I was just going to say "sounds like you have to take the day off Dad"  Welcome to the board fishman2202!  I'm taking my daughter out this weekend......... IN THE BOAT! WWWOOOOOOOOOOO!  Softwater season has arrived!!!!!  Good luck out on the ice, and be safe! UF
Ya see that dad! Pressure is on, a lot of people read this board!  Ha ha  welcome aboard  edit* crap...my joke was late. Note to self read all posts before posting
Welcome aboard!!
Neither one of us. We are strickly catch and release. We hope to see the fish again............when they grow up!!

Welcome to the board Fisherm2202.If you are anything like your dad you are a good guy in my books.I to have a son (18) who just l o v e s to fish.Cant get him off the water most times.Fishing is one of the best things for kids to get involved in.It does keep them out of trouble.Tony there is no better fishing partner to have than your son.Congrats guys. Dan
Thanks Dan. BTW, the auger works great.   My son poked around 20 holes with it on Saturday and had it mastered after a couple. Looking forward to using it one last time Friday.
Great to have both of you on board. Wish I could get my son a little more interested in fishing. Even the promise of missing school doesn't motivate him.
